content: Introduced the concept of 'Memory Without Memory' as a method to emulate continuity across stateless AI sessions, inspired by human memory practices and collaborative scaffolding.
Affirmed that session-based AI memory limitations can be transformed into a collaborative design strength if explicitly scaffolded by humans.
Captured multi-agent orchestration strategy: separating conceptual scaffolding, dialogic reasoning, and data artifact generation across multiple AI systems.
Recommended beginning Memory Shell work with sample JSON scaffolding to reinforce traceability and reproducibility of all agent contributions.
Generated complete sample-memory-entries.json content for use in examples folder, following schema fields for id, agent, content, tags, timestamp, hash, and version.
